title: Platform Engineer
description: Currently holding a position as a Platform Engineer in the Channel Data & Insights team at Investec. This is a primarily integration, full-stack and cloud engineering role working on the channel (digital and servicing) data and analytics platform.

title: Data Engineer and Analyst
description: Joined Investec as part of the Tech Grad cohort of 2024. I joined the Channel Data & Insights team, where I work primarily as a data engineer and analyst, building data pipelines for the ingestion and modeling for both pre and post login digital behaviour data.

title: Computer Science Tutor
description: I tutored two second-year modules: Theoretical Computer Science, and Data Structures and Algorithms. Between the two modules, duties included helping students understand the content, marking assignments and tests, and advising students on their practical work.
